display.title: Not Funny, Didn't Laugh
description: &&3Jungle Trees&&r are covered in &&3Vines&&r - a &&dclimbable&&r plant gatherable with &&3Shears&&r.
Jungle Trees can only regrown with four &&3Jungle Saplings&&r in a square.
&&3Cocoa Beans&&r also grow on jungle trees, and can be &&dcrafted into Cookies&&r.
When &&dtamed with seeds&&r, &&aParrots&&r will perch on your shoulder and occasionally &&dmimic the sounds of mobs&&r.
Like &&aCats&&r, &&aOcelots&&r scare away &&cCreepers&&r - but they &&dcan't be tamed&&r. They can be fed &&3Raw Fish&&r if approached slowly to gain &&3trust&&r.
